title: Local traffic: a suburban dilemma
brief_description: Sandringham is a suburb where through traffic is causing problems in local streets. The program follows the process whereby residents press their local council to take action on the problem. A firm of consultants is appointed and we see the following five stages at work: the study, the proposal, the survey, the debate and the outcome.
